Body:
mos = Mosaic()
m_obj = 3
n_obj = 4
p_obj = 2
new_obj = np.ones((m_obj, n_obj, p_obj))
m_side = 2
n_side = 2
n = m_side * n_side
for ct in range(n):
    mos.append(new_obj)
assert mos.shape == tuple(n * [new_obj.shape])
assert mos.size == n
assert mos.issamedim
assert mos.dtype == np.float
with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    mos.mosaic2d((m_side, n_side)).shape
mos.parameters['Order'] = 'R'
assert mos.mosaic2d((m_side, n_side), idx=0).shape == (m_side * m_obj, 
    n_side * n_obj)
assert mos.mosaic2d((m_side, n_side), idx=0).shape == mos.mosaic_shape((
    m_side, n_side), idx=0)
assert mos.mosaicfull((m_side, n_side)).shape == (m_side * m_obj, n_side *
    n_obj, p_obj)
assert mos.mosaicfull((m_side, n_side)).shape == mos.mosaic_shape((m_side,
    n_side))
mos.parameters['Order'] = 'C'
assert mos.mosaic2d((m_side, n_side), idx=0).shape == (m_side * m_obj, 
    n_side * n_obj)
assert mos.mosaic2d((m_side, n_side), idx=0).shape == mos.mosaic_shape((
    m_side, n_side), idx=0)
assert mos.mosaicfull((m_side, n_side)).shape == (m_side * m_obj, n_side *
    n_obj, p_obj)
assert mos.mosaicfull((m_side, n_side)).shape == mos.mosaic_shape((m_side,
    n_side))
